comments.comments_text: The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Real Madrid.

comments.comments_text: It's 1:0! Gareth Bale feeds Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) inside the box, who is unmarked and buries the ball in the bottom left corner.

comments.comments_text: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.

comments.comments_text: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Luka Modric (Real Madrid). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

comments.comments_text: Real Madrid will have a chance to score from a corner kick. Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Boy Waterman into the bottom left corner.

comments.comments_text: Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Benoit Bastien didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. [REFEREE] didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

comments.comments_text: A yellow card for a tackle by Roland Sallai (APOEL). Benoit Bastien doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A yellow card for a tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]). [REFEREE] doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

comments.comments_text: A substitution has been made. Roland Sallai is replaced by Agustin Farias (APOEL).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A substitution has been made. [PLAYER] is replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: What a GOAL that is! Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) showed great determination to get to the ball inside the box and acrobatically launched himself into the air and produced a scissor kick of the highest quality to leave Boy Waterman helpless. He makes it 3:0.

comments.comments_text: The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate this behaviour. Lorenzo Ebecilio (APOEL) is given a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Casemiro (Real Madrid) picks up a loose pass and unexpectedly unleashes a howitzer from distance, but the effort comes to nothing as a defender gets in the block. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Real Madrid will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
